remarks: Preservation of the modular pair property in the one-to-one onto mapping between the two sublattices in Lemma 1.3 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 2 (join version).  (Contributed by NM, 29-Apr-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
mdslmd.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
mdslmd.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
mdslmd.3 $e |- C e. CH $.
mdslmd.4 $e |- D e. CH $.
mdslmd2i $p |- ( ( ( A MH B /\ B MH* A ) /\ ( ( A i^i B ) C_ ( C i^i D ) /\ ( C vH D ) C_ B ) ) -> ( C MH D <-> ( C vH A ) MH ( D vH A ) ) ) $.
